card.name: Deconstitute
card.text: Enchant nonland permanent Enchanted permanent is an enchantment, and loses all other card types and abilities. (It can't be attacked if it was a battle, and it can't attack or block if it was a creature.)

card.name: Mana-Thrust Skater
card.text: During your turn, Mana-Thrust Skater has first strike. When Mana-Thrust Skater enters or attacks, another target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Deep-Focus Automaton
card.text: Amp — {3}, {T}: Tap target creature. (This ability costs {2} less to activate if you've attacked with an equipped creature this turn.)

card.name: Leadership
card.text: Flying When Leadership enters, create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens. 2W — 3

card.name: Rooftop Runners
card.text: Whenever Rooftop Runners enters or attacks, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) Amp — {3}{U}: Rooftop Runners gains flying until end of turn. (This ability costs {2} less to activate if you've attacked with an equipped creature this turn.)

card.name: Tune In
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

card.name: Soaring Gearheads
card.text: Flying When Soaring Gearheads enters, create a Weapon token. (It's an artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and has equip {2}.)

card.name: Flight of Fancy
card.text: Choose one— • Put a flying counter on target creature you control. • Target nonland permanent's owner puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: Rearm
card.text: Return target artifact or creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Create a Weapon token. (It's an artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and has equip {2}.)

card.name: Junkyard Emergent
card.text: When Junkyard Emergent dies, it deals 2 damage to target player, planeswalker, or battle, and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Ambient Shellcrafter
card.text: During your turn, Ambient Shellcrafter has lifelink. {3}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Create a 4/4 Incarnation creature token that's all colors. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Model Weapon
Combat Apprentice
card.text: Whenever you attack with one or more equipped creatures, Combat Apprentice deals 1 damage to target player, planeswalker, or battle.

card.name: Weapon Surge
card.text: Choose one— • Weapon Surge deals 4 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Patchwork Collector
card.text: When Patchwork Collector enters, create a Weapon token. (It's an artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and has equip {2}.) Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Roving Skaters
card.text: Whenever Roving Skaters enters or attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Amp — {3}{R}: Roving Skaters gains menace until end of turn. (This ability costs {2} less to activate if you've attacked with an equipped creature this turn.)

card.name: New Sights to See
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. When you search your library this way, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Traveling Aspirants
card.text: Trample {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Traveling Aspirants.

card.name: Internal Weaponcraft
card.text: Create a Weapon token, then attach it to target creature you control. (It's an artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and has equip {2}.) {1}{G}, Exile Internal Weaponcraft from your graveyard: Create a Weapon token, then attach it to target creature you control. Activate only if an opponent lost life or a battle was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Greatsword Student
card.text: When Greatsword Student enters, create a Weapon token. (It's an artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and has equip {2}.) Greatsword Student can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Personal Headphones
Infused Heirloom
card.text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Infused Heirloom: Destroy target token nonland permanent. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Infused Heirloom: Destroy target nontoken, nonland permanent.

card.name: Potential
card.text: When Potential enters, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. 2 — 3

card.name: Self-Experimentalist
card.text: When Self-Experimentalist dies, create a Weapon token. (It's an artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and has equip {2}.)

card.name: Genius Attuner
card.text: {T}: Add {G} or {U}. At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've spent five or more mana to cast spells this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Untap it. It gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Soaring Masterwork
card.text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying When Soaring Masterwork enters, mill four cards. Put a nonland permanent card from among the milled cards into your hand. If it was an artifact, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Local Hero
card.text: When Local Hero enters, create a Weapon token. (It's an artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and has equip {2}.) Local Hero gets +1/+1 for each nonland permanent you control.

card.name: Free-Wheeling Musician
card.text: Menace At the beginning of your second main phase, if you've discarded a card this turn, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Celebration
card.text: Menace Whenever Celebration enters or attacks, discard your hand, then draw three cards. 2RR — 3

card.name: Town Trasher
card.text: Town Trasher can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. At the beginning of your second main phase, if an opponent lost life or a battle was dealt damage this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Town Trasher. It deals 1 damage to each opponent and to each battle they protect.

card.name: Vivid Pyrokinetic
card.text: Noncreature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. When Vivid Pyrokinetic enters, mill three cards. When you do, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Crafty Combatant
card.text: When Crafty Combatant enters, create a Weapon token. (It's an artifact with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and has equip {2}.) Whenever you attack, target attacking equipped creature gains your choice of first strike or trample until end of turn.

card.name: Verdant Repose
card.text: When Verdant Repose enters, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Verdant Repose gets +1/+1 for each land you control. 1GG — 3

card.name: Ambient Summoner
card.text: When Ambient Summoner enters, create a 4/4 Incarnation creature token that's all colors. Whenever you attack, attacking creatures with power 4 or greater can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less until end of turn.

card.name: Spellwork Enthusiast
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Calm
card.text: When Calm enters, tap target artifact or creature. Put two stun counters on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) 2U — 3 (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Fateful Encounter
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {4} or sacrifice an artifact or creature. Destroy target creature.

card.name: Quick Slash
card.text: Choose one— • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gets an additional +1/+1 until end of turn. • Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent.

card.name: Outpace
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature, planeswalker, or battle.

card.name: A Dark Whisper
card.text: When A Dark Whisper enters, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life. 2B — 3

card.name: Ambition
card.text: Whenever Ambition enters or attacks, it deals X damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle, where X is the number of creatures and battles you control. Excess damage is dealt to that permanent's controller instead. 2BR — 3

card.name: Creation
card.text: Whenever Creation enters or attacks, create a 1/1 Servo artifact creature token. When you do, you may have each token you control become a copy of target permanent not named Creation, except it's not legendary. 2GU — 3

card.name: Introspection
card.text: Whenever Introspection enters or attacks, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. 2UB — 3

card.name: Love
card.text: Whenever Love enters or attacks, up to two target creatures gain double strike until end of turn. Untap them. 1RW — 3

card.name: Wanderlust
card.text: Whenever Wanderlust enters or attacks, mill six cards, then put up to two permanent cards with total mana value 3 or less from from among the milled cards onto the battlefield. 2GW — 3

card.name: Love
card.text: Whenever Love enters or attacks, up to two target creatures gain double strike until end of turn. Untap them. 1RW — 3
